document.docAuthor: Ren, Jinlong, Li, Yan & Yang, Ding
document.masterDocTitle: Two new species of Tipula (Vestiplex) Bezzi (Diptera, Tipulidae) from Northwest China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Two new species of Tipula (Vestiplex) Bezzi (Diptera, Tipulidae) from Northwest China

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Key Laboratory of the Pest Monitoring and Safety Control on the Crop and Forest, College of Agronomy, Xinjiang Agricultural University, Urumqi 830052, China. & rjlinsect @ 163. com; https: // orcid. org / 0000 - 0001 - 5948 - 1724

Guangdong Key Laboratory of Animal Conservation and Resource Utilization, Guangdong Public Laboratory of Wild Animal Conservation and Utilization, Institute of Zoology, Guangdong Academy of Sciences, Guangzhou 510260, China. & Dpartment of Entomology, China Agricultural University, Beijing 100193, China.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Tipula ( Vestiplex ) scripta immunda : Savchenko, 1964: 162
;
Oosterbroek and Theowald, 1992: 158
(synonymy after Starkevich and Podenas, 2015 ).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 33–35.
Tipula ( Vestiplex ) scripta
. 33: male habitus, lateral view; 34: head and thorax, dorsal view; 35: right wing. Scale bars 1.0 mm.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 36–39.
Tipula ( Vestiplex ) scripta
. 36: hypopygium, lateral view; 37: tergite 9, dorsal view; 38: hypopygium, ventral view; 39: lobe and clasper of gonostyli with apex of gonocoxites, lateral view. Scale bars: 0.5 mm (36–38), 0.1 mm (39).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Elevation range in
China .
Adults were collected at altitudes ranging from
1100 m
to 1800 m .
Period of activity. Adults were collected only in July.

Known distribution. Andorra , Austria , Belarus , Belgium , Bosnia–Herzegovina , Bulgaria , China ( Xinjiang ), Croatia , Czech Rep., Denmark , Estonia , Finland , France , Germany , Great Britain , Greece , Hungary , Ireland , Italy , Kazakhstan , Latvia , Liechtenstein , Lithuania , Luxembourg , Macedonia, Mongolia , Montenegro , Netherlands , Norway , Poland , Romania , Russia , Serbia , Slovakia , Slovenia , Spain , Sweden , Switzerland , Ukraine .
Remark. This is the first report of this species from China .
